meanings.definition: A person who boasts or talks with excessive pride about their achievements or possessions.
meanings.sent2: The braggers at the party wouldn't stop talking about themselves.
meanings.sent3: The braggers in the office always have a story to tell.
meanings.sent4: The braggers in the group stood out like shining stars.
meanings.sent5: The braggers in the class made everyone roll their eyes.

meanings.definition: To boast or talk with excessive pride about one's achievements or possessions.
meanings.sent1: She always brags about her grades.
meanings.sent2: He brags so much that no one believes him anymore.
meanings.sent3: The kids braggers about their video game skills.
meanings.sent4: The singer braggers about her upcoming album.
meanings.sent5: They braggers about their new car all the time.
